product_name: BOB Sport Utility Stroller / Ironman Sun Shield - Duallie
long_description: This BOB Sun Shield cover is designed for the Sport Utility and Ironman Duallie strollers, blocking harmful ultraviolet rays (UVA/UVB) and protecting passengers from wind and flying bugs. Main front panel is constructed of protective mesh that allows children to see out and parents to see in. Remainder of the Sun Shield cover is constructed out of sturdy nylon for lasting use. Elastic attachment is simple and easy. The BOB Sun Shield cover fits BOB Sport Utility and Ironman Duallie strollers.
short_description: This BOB Sun Shield cover is designed for the Sport Utility and Ironman Duallie strollers, blocking harmful ultraviolet rays (UVA/UVB) and protecting passengers from wind and flying bugs.
